title: Wood Half-Elf
content:
Wood Half-Elf Racial Features Base Racial Speed Civil Militia Darkvision Fey Ancestry Subrace Traits Fleet of Foot Mask of the Wild

Base Racial Speed Civil Militia Darkvision Fey Ancestry

Fleet of Foot Mask of the Wild

Wood Half-Elf is a Subrace of Half-Elf in Baldur's Gate 3. Wood Half-Elves have the ability to gain Mask of the Wild as a subracial bonus. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 8 different types of Races. Each of them has their special charact
